block.p: Megan Elizabeth Maroney, a daughter of Margaret Solin of Briarcliff Manor, N.Y., and Thomas Maroney of Asheville, N.C., was married on Thursday to Peter Gerard Ward, a son of Breege Ward of Dublin and the late Ray Ward. The Rev. Dermot McNiece performed the ceremony at Our Lady of Mercy Roman Catholic Church in Blessington, Ireland.

Mrs. Ward, 28, is a retail manager for Steven Stolman, a fashion designer in New York. She is also a freelance photographer. She graduated from Boston College. The bride's father retired in 1987 as the village justice for North Tarrytown, N.Y., and a partner in Walsh, Maroney & Ponzini, a law firm that was in Tarrytown, N.Y. He now owns Banner Therapy, a medical supplies distributorship in Asheville. Her mother is the creative director at Benchmark Media, an educational video and film production and distribution company in Briarcliff Manor that is owned by Mike Solin, the bride's stepfather.
